casebody.data:
Gilly v. Springer, in Error. IN an action on a note, payable at the Commercial Bank of Louisville, the breach laid was, that the defendant, although often requested, had not paid, &c.: Held, on general demurrer, that the breach was too general (1).

Vide Palmier v. Hughes, November term, 1824, post.

 [NO OPINION]
